directions: Pour coffee into an ice cube tray; freeze until coffee ice cubes form, 1 to 2 hours.
Combine coffee ice cubes, soy milk, chocolate syrup, peanut butter, vanilla extract, and no-calorie sweetener in a blender. Cover and blend until frothy.
ingredients: 1 packet granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)
title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Iced Coffee
